Vulois/Octociz and Bronco


Vulois/Terminess/Octociz and Bronco


Vulois stepped out of the CR Chamber, fully refreshed. He saw Battera near 
the chamber. Curious bot. Won't wait for anything. He said to her.

"Come with me to Terminess' lab. I'll tell you the plan there.

Vulois than sent a message to Soundwave.

"Join us at Terminess' lab. I will tell you all there."

Vulois took off towards the lab.

______________________________________________________________________

Terminess was estatic. She had found her pod, and was going to be able to 
make a ship out of it!

"YES! Now I can go home and re-take possesion of my gang."

She quickly hitched the pod to her back and started towards the Pred base.

________________________________________________________________________


Bronco smiled and sent a message back to Iron Raptor.

"Killing me doesn't matter. If I die in battle, it is honourable. I have 
nothing left to live for. Also, if you go on a rampage, your judgement will 
be impaired, leaving the Maximals without a competent leader and open for 
destruction. I will give you one more mega-cycle. But since you still lack 
things, You will only get a certain part."

Bronco pulls out a strange device he built. He puts it straight to Octociz' 
chest, and begins to pull on the handle. Octociz screams and screams, and 
finaly goes offline. Inside the machine, is the lifeforce of Octociz: His 
Spark.

"You have one meag-cycle, Iron Raptor, And no funny stuff. This machine is 
now Octociz' life machine. If I remove his spark from it, within 5 cycles he 
would die. So keep it to a minimum. Just you, no weapons. See you in one 
mega-cycle."

Bronco kicks the empty shell of Octociz into the sea, where it will be 
buried with the Axalon forever. Bronco laughed.
